duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate with project management personnel to develop and prepare procurement packages.
Manage competitive bidding/selection processes for construction and/or professional services.
Ensure strict adherence to policies, procedures, templates, and applicable laws.
Report, track, and maintain quality control for assigned procurement processes.
Manage multiple concurrent procurement processes with various stakeholders.
Ensure consistent audits and compliance with internal and external requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (relevant field preference above others)
Knowledgeable of standard contract terms and conditions
